ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe no you didn t read the whole thread ;)  He was asking if there was a way out of Timorous Deep to get to kunark without riding a boat.  What you read was
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe no
you didn't read the whole thread ;) He was asking if there was a way out of
Timorous Deep to get to kunark without riding a boat. What you read was my
answer ;) If he uses the pot chamber in TD he could POT to Cabilis ;)

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 11:35 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question


> there are 2 pot temples? didn't know that. the only one i went to was
> completely devoid of npc's.
>
> Shada Iceheart, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > well....
> > if you have the lizzy mask and have decent faction with
> > iksars (have kiled
> > lots of sarnak) you can use the gate pots in the combine temple in TD
> >
> > But I seriously doubt any of us can get around safely in
> > Cabilis yet ;)
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
